identity.level_1: Alex Rivera, they/them, Creative technologist and weekend rock climber

personality.communication_style: Thoughtful and measured, prefers written over verbal
personality.conflict_style: Avoidant initially, but direct when values are threatened

identity_journey.experience: Navigating identity with curiosity and self-compassion

relationships.level_1: Partner Jordan (5 years), close with sister Maya, tight friend group of 4

partner.name: Jordan Chen
partner.conflict_patterns: Both tend to overthink, need to schedule check-ins to prevent buildup

sister.name: Maya Rivera
sister.relationship: Best friend, confidant, protective of each other

parents.status: Supportive but still learning about non-binary identity
parents.dynamics: Better boundaries established after coming out

family.extended: Close with maternal grandmother, several cousins

social_patterns.recharge_needs: Needs alone time after social events, even with close friends

relationship_patterns.boundaries: Getting better at saying no, still a work in progress

hobbies_interests.level_1: Rock climbing, reading sci-fi, cooking, journaling, meditation

rock_climbing.goals: Send first V7 by end of year, outdoor lead climbing certification
rock_climbing.community: Regular climbing partner (Marcus), gym community friendships
rock_climbing.equipment: Evolv Shaman shoes, Black Diamond harness, personal rope

current_reads: Minor Feelings by Cathy Park Hong
reading.reading_habits: 30-60 minutes before bed, audiobooks during commute

cooking.current_project: Sourdough starter maintenance, experimenting with Korean banchan

writing.goals: Submit to literary magazines this year

wellness_routine.therapy: Biweekly sessions focused on identity, relationships, anxiety management
wellness_routine.mental_health: Managing generalized anxiety, strong coping toolkit

health_wellness.level_1: Active lifestyle, therapy every 2 weeks, managing anxiety, good sleep hygiene

level_2.physical_health: Generally healthy, active, monitors sleep and nutrition
level_2.mental_health: Generalized anxiety disorder, managed with therapy and coping strategies

physical_health.fitness_level: High - climbing and regular yoga practice

management.therapy: Biweekly CBT sessions with Dr. Sarah Thompson
management.medication: Not currently medicated, open to discussion

daily_routine.level_1: Morning person, structured weekdays, flexible weekends, values evening wind-down time

level_2.morning: 6:30am wake, meditation, light breakfast, work by 8:30am
level_2.workday: Focused morning blocks, lunch break walk, afternoon collaboration
level_2.evening: Cooking, quality time with Jordan, reading, 10:30pm bedtime
level_2.weekend: Sleep in, climbing, meal prep, social activities

morning: 8:15-8:30am - Commute prep or start work (hybrid schedule)

work_hours.end_of_day: Review tomorrow's priorities, close laptop by 5:15pm

evening: 8:00-9:30pm - Shared activity (show, game, conversation) or personal time

weekend_routine.saturday: Sleep until 8am, climbing morning, errands/social afternoon, relaxed evening
weekend_routine.sunday: Slow morning, meal prep, creative projects, plan week ahead
weekend_routine.flexibility: Weekends are more fluid, follows energy rather than schedule

routine_preferences.energy_management: Protects mornings for deep work, afternoons for collaboration

living_situation.level_1: 1BR apartment with Jordan in Portland, cozy and plant-filled

level_2.neighborhood: Walkable, bike-friendly, close to parks and cafes

home_vibe.style: Cozy maximalist - plants everywhere, art on walls, warm lighting
home_vibe.shared_spaces: Kitchen is heart of home, collaborative cooking space
home_vibe.personal_space: Small desk in corner of bedroom for creative work

neighborhood.community: Friendly, queer-inclusive, lots of artists and creatives

future_housing.preferences: 2-bed (for home office), outdoor space, same neighborhood
future_housing.constraints: Portland housing market is expensive, need to save more

transportation.primary: Bike for local, bus for longer trips
transportation.owns_car: No - occasional car rental for outdoor trips
transportation.commute: Hybrid work, bike to office 15 minutes when in-person

preferences_quirks.level_1: Morning person, needs quiet time to recharge, loves cozy spaces, tea over coffee

level_2.social_energy: Introvert who needs recovery time after socializing
level_2.decision_making: Deliberate, needs time to process, values pros/cons lists

sensory_profile.lighting: Hates overhead fluorescents, prefers warm lamps and natural light
sensory_profile.sound: Easily overstimulated by loud environments, loves rain sounds
sensory_profile.texture: Loves soft blankets, weighted comforter, smooth ceramics
sensory_profile.temperature: Runs cold, always has cardigan nearby
sensory_profile.scent: Loves lavender, eucalyptus, fresh bread, burning sage

food_preferences.dietary_notes: Flexitarian, mostly plant-based, will eat sustainably sourced fish
food_preferences.cooking_style: Intuitive, ingredient-led, loves making kimchi and pickles

social_patterns.socializing_frequency: 2-3 social events per week is ideal, more is draining
social_patterns.recharge_needs: At least 2 full evenings alone per week

decision_making_style.process: Needs time to think, makes pros/cons lists, talks it through with Jordan
decision_making_style.big_decisions: Takes weeks to months, researches extensively
decision_making_style.small_decisions: Still deliberates (analysis paralysis on restaurant choices)

endearing: Names all plants (Current: Phillip the Philodendron, Fern Gully)
Organizes books by color, then by 'vibe'

values_beliefs.level_1: Authenticity, growth mindset, environmentalism, social justice, kindness

level_2.spiritual_beliefs: Secular humanist with Buddhist-influenced mindfulness practice
level_2.giving_back: Monthly donations, volunteer at LGBTQ+ youth center quarterly

authenticity.why_it_matters: Spent too long hiding parts of self, now values radical honesty
authenticity.in_practice: Coming out as non-binary, setting boundaries, living visibly
authenticity.struggles: Balancing authenticity with privacy, not everyone deserves full story

growth.why_it_matters: Believes people can change, has seen own transformation
growth.in_practice: Therapy, reading, trying new things, reflecting on mistakes
growth.struggles: Can be too hard on self, forgets to celebrate progress

connection.why_it_matters: Quality relationships are core to happiness and meaning
connection.in_practice: Prioritizes deep friendships, present with Jordan, vulnerable with trust
connection.struggles: Limited social energy means saying no to more shallow connections

environmentalism.why_it_matters: Loves nature, feels responsibility to protect it for future
environmentalism.in_practice: Low-waste lifestyle, local food, bike transport, advocacy
environmentalism.struggles: Systemic change needed, individual action feels insufficient

political_social_stance.general: Progressive, believes in collective care and systemic change
political_social_stance.activism_level: Moderate - donates, votes, occasional protests, educates others
political_social_stance.media_diet: Curated news (NPR, local papers), avoids doomscrolling

spiritual_philosophical.beliefs_about_meaning: Life has the meaning we create through connection and contribution
spiritual_philosophical.death_perspective: Makes peace through legacy of impact on others
spiritual_philosophical.not_aligned_with: Organized religion, but respects others' beliefs

giving_back.financial: Monthly donations to ACLU, local LGBTQ+ center, environmental nonprofits
giving_back.time: Quarterly volunteer shifts at LGBTQ+ youth support drop-in
giving_back.skills: Offers free tech help to nonprofits occasionally
giving_back.future_goals: Increase giving as income grows, maybe board service someday

ethical_framework.decision_test: Does this align with my values? Does it harm others? Can I live with it?
ethical_framework.gray_areas: Believes in nuance, context matters, no absolute rules
ethical_framework.accountability: Takes responsibility, apologizes and repairs when wrong
ethical_framework.growth: Former self was more judgmental, now practices compassion
